author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ubisoft Entertainment Announces Acquisition Of 1492 Studio
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - UBISOFT:
* UBISOFT ENTERTAINMENT: UBISOFT ACQUIRES 1492 STUDIO * ‍ADDITIONAL TERMS OF DEAL ARE NOT BEING DISCLOSED​ * ‍THIS ACQUISITION OF 1492 STUDIO IS EXPECTED TO BE IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO UBISOFT‘S EARNINGS​
* ‍ACQUISITION WAS COMPLETED ON FEBRUARY 28, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
